text: Berghof or Berghoff may refer to: * Berghof (residence), Adolf Hitler's home in the mountains of Bavaria * Berghof (Vienna), Roman settlement in Vienna, Austria * The Berghoff (restaurant), Chicago, US * Berghoff, a beer brewed by the Joseph Huber Brewing Company * German exonym for the city of Brocēni, Latvia ==People== *Herman Berghoff, founder of The Berghoff (restaurant) in Chicago, US *Maggie Berghoff, American clinician ==See also== * Berkhoff (surname) * Berkhof (disambiguation) * Berkoff (disambiguation)
title: Berghof
